name: Newoldstamp Inc.
description: Developer of an email signature platform designed to turn employee's email into a powerful marketing tool. The company's platform offers to engage every promising personality or business to the digital world and help to strengthen their brand image by using a catchy email signature, enabling clients to empower their daily email activities with new possibilities to drive traffic and growth.
